POPTASTIC - Encrypted Chat over POP3/IMAP Server

short_description:
Secure E-Mail Client & Instant Messenger

English User Manual: https://en.wikibooks.org/wiki/Goldbug
German Handbuch: http://goldbug.sourceforge.net/goldbug-manual_DE.html

FEATURES:
 # Secure decentral P2P/F2F Instant Messaging Chat.
 # Store Email for Offline-Friends in the P2P Network. 
 # Echo Protocol (EMPP = Echoed Messaging and Presence Protocol)
 # Choose RSA, ElGamal, NTRU
 # Multi/Hybrid Encryption (PK/SSL: libgcrypt & OpenSSL / HTTPS)
 # End-to-End Encryption: Additional Security Layer with the Gemini-Feature (AES) for Chat-Partners. 
 # Accounts for F2F-Web of Trust. 
 # Open Source BSD License. For libs see libs.

C++/Qt-COMPILE:
Since version 2.0 find the source in GIT
https://github.com/textbrowser/spot-on

Windows:
qmake -o Makefile goldbug.win.qt5.pro 
make or mingw32-make

or choose in Qt-Creator: goldbug.win.qt5.pro
